room_title: Escape room "Crime Scene Investigator (CSI)" by Escape Room Cleveland in Cleveland
room_description:
CSI Max Lockridge has been found murdered in his home. He was well-known for taking high-profile cases against powerful criminals. In the end, this created many enemies for Lockridge and the constant news coverage made him a target.
As a member of the Crime Scene Investigation unit, you have 60 minutes to investigate this crime and bring the killer/killers to justice. If you choose to take this case, be careful and watch your back because YOU are the target now.
